Method Summary
 void analyze()
          analyze, as its name suggests, analyzes a RevisionNode list and finds helpful data on the revisions as a whole data found includes: max/min/average relevance rating max/min/average number of files changed in a revision average number of relevant files file groupings

Method Detail

analyze

public void analyze()
analyze, as its name suggests, analyzes a RevisionNode list and finds helpful data on the revisions as a whole data found includes: max/min/average relevance rating max/min/average number of files changed in a revision average number of relevant files file groupings

statsOut

percentages

public void percentages(java.lang.String[] files,
                        java.io.PrintWriter out)
                 throws java.io.IOException
percentages, using the user-defined parameters coupled with the parsed log information it determines the percentage of the occurrences of one file's changes in relation to the presence of another at that revision for all files in the parameters

Parameters:
files - relevant files, as determined by the user in the command-line parameters
Throws:
java.io.IOException
